text: CVE-2025-12345 allows remote execution. APT29 targeted finance. The IP 8.8.8.8 was flagged. Domain: foo.example.com
Attacker used TrickBot malware to spread laterally across banks.
The actor APT28 employed the Zeus malware family.
Malicious domain abc-malware[.]com identified; IP 10.0.0.1 also involved.
Reported fake CVE-9999-XXXX string should not be counted as valid CVE.
Lazarus is suspected to use Emotet; see sub.domain.co.uk for staging.
Suspicious IP 256.0.0.1 is invalid; but 1.2.3.4 is valid.
The domain bad..com is malformed. CVE-2023-999 invalid pattern.
APT29 and APT28 activities overlap; TrickBot resurfaces.
Indicators include domain evil-site.org and IP 192.168.0.200.
